flavorText: "I am neither their drover nor their leader. To these majestic beasts, I am simply their herdmate and nothing more."

name: Advocate of the Beast
originalText: At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on target Beast creature you control.

rulings.text: If you don’t control any Beast creatures as your end step begins, the ability will be removed from the stack and will have no effect.

text: At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on target Beast creature you control.
